entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PushModalAsync ignored at application startup #11745
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload not working on Windows VS 2022 #11743
  • [Android] Review if we should force layouts to not be accessible #11742
  • Maui Binding does not respect Binding.DoNothing returned from IValueConverter #11740
  • .NET 8 Feature Request: Support Blazor Hybrid on Linux/Ubuntu #11738
  • Can't debug windows app after adding elevated permissions #11730
  • Label binding not works in collectionview in release mode #11726
  • MaximumWidthRequest actually set WidthRequest. #11725
  • Element.ChildRemoved event has wrong sender #11720
    Backlog
  • Impossible to add the background gradients feature on ContentPage iOS #11714
    Backlog

Closed

  • it looks like the webpage at https:/0.0.0.0/ might be having issues #8613
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ToolbarItems do not work correctly on Windows #11639
  • VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups - Unique name #11701
  • Buttons behind "Pop-Up" are handling taps in Android, which is different than Windows behavior (and Xamarin) #11663
  • How to customize the default installation path of packaged programs #11728
  • Get native Window handle from control #11718
  • Binding does not work for Platform dependent Behaviors #11729
  • Grid View Row is not working as expected #9458
    Backlog
  • Change IOS App Icon #11722
  • Thread safe issues about PathFigureCollectionConverter #11321
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix Element.ChildRemoved event sender #11741
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Don't set editor action to handled #11739
    area/controls 🎮
  • [7.0-sr1] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11737
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Fix RefreshView crash if no content is specified #11735
  • [6.0-sr8] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Build] Remove unused variable #11727
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages

Merged

  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11692
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Using local function to fix multi-thread issues #11497
    area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    community ✨
  • Ensure invisible views don't get rows/columns when generating AndExpand layouts #11712
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update templates to have separate default for framework selection #11034
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
